refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Given a valid instrument instance, this opcode stops it.

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: kinstance -- a valid instrument instance. Whether of finite duration or held, the instance currently being performed is immediately removed from the active instance list. No other instances are affected.
